item.title: Hardware Trends of the 2010s: Part 2 of Tech That Reshaped our Lives in the Last Decade
item.description:
This is part 2 of a 6-part series. Read Part 1 for Background. Go to Part 3 on Software trends.

When it comes to hardware, the last decade has brought some subtle but important changes to the sort of hardware we buy and use.

Photo by Alexandre Debiève on Unsplash

Large-screen phones

When Samsung introduced the first Galaxy Note in 2011, everybody thought they were crazy because the 5.3 inch screen looked massive. People even felt the need to invent a new term for this, a ‘phablet’. When I saw friend hold her Note to her ear, it looked so strange I had to take a picture. When I look at it now, it looks perfectly normal.
